markdown:
<title level="1" right="Rules">[Chapter 4: Feats](/Rules.aspx?ID=1437)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 201 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Some talents can be acquired by any character, regardless of their ancestry or class, through dedication or specialized training. This chapter presents new general feats, including many new skill feats. For the full rules on general feats and skill feats, see [here](/Rules.aspx?ID=180).
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Chapter 4: Feats
text: Chapter 4: Feats Source Advanced Player's Guide pg. 201 2.0 Some talents can be acquired by any character, regardless of their ancestry or class, through dedication or specialized training. This chapter presents new general feats, including many new skill feats. For the full rules on general feats and skill feats, see here.
